LanguageData.PSFT.forprisoners.label: Applies to prisoners
LanguageData.PSFT.forslaves.label: Applies to slaves
LanguageData.PSFT.applyterror.label: Turrets applies terror to slaves
LanguageData.PSFT.applyterror.description: When slaves sees an active turret they will get terror thoughts and this makes suppression last longer
LanguageData.PSFT.nothing.label: You should select one option since the mod will not do anything otherwise
LanguageData.PSFT.logging.label: Enable verbose logging
LanguageData.PSFT.logging.tooltip: Shows verbose logging, for finding errors
LanguageData.PSFT.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
